caption: Relating to the determination of resident status of students by public institutions of higher education.
undersanding:
Summary (English):
This bill modifies Texas education code regarding resident status determination for higher education. It removes provisions that allowed undocumented students to qualify for in-state tuition based on high school graduation in Texas. The bill explicitly states that individuals not authorized under federal law to be in the US cannot be considered state residents for tuition purposes. Chinese students without proper federal authorization will be reclassified as non-residents.

Summary (Chinese):
该法案修改了德克萨斯州教育法规中关于高等教育居民身份认定的规定。法案删除了允许无证学生基于在德州高中毕业而获得州内学费资格的条款。法案明确规定，根据联邦法律未获准在美国居留的个人不能被视为州居民。没有适当联邦授权的中国学生将被重新归类为非居民身份。

Most likely committees:
1. Higher Education Committee
2. Education Committee
3. State Affairs Committee
